TopicTitle: Hello! New KSP astronaut from UK

Articles.Content:
Hello!

Been playing KSP in my spare time for the last 2 days. must have launched 30 rockets. today i managed to Land or technically strand 3 separate Kerbanauts on The Mun!

totally addicted to this!!!!

my next goal is to get back from the mun. after that to Minmus! joined the forum to get some hints and tips and maybe find some mods!

I found the game through "Nerdcubed" on Youtube! thought it looked amazing so brought it

Any who. back to the drawing board with my rockets!

Edited August 27, 2012 by lordchris
